module: Cisco-IOS-XE-environment-oper
  +--ro environment-sensors
     +--ro environment-sensor* [name location]
        +--ro state?                     string
        +--ro current-reading?           uint32
        +--ro sensor-units?              environment-ios-xe-oper:sensor-units-type
        +--ro low-critical-threshold?    int32
        +--ro low-normal-threshold?      int32
        +--ro high-normal-threshold?     int32
        +--ro high-critical-threshold?   int32
        +--ro name                       string
        +--ro location                   string

  grouping sensor-name-loc-key
    +-- name?       string
    +-- location?   string
  grouping sensor-params
    +-- state?                     string
    +-- current-reading?           uint32
    +-- sensor-units?              environment-ios-xe-oper:sensor-units-type
    +-- low-critical-threshold?    int32
    +-- low-normal-threshold?      int32
    +-- high-normal-threshold?     int32
    +-- high-critical-threshold?   int32
